title: Aw ye bolomafara di Orbital Temple ma
heading: I ka bolomafara dafa
chooseHow: I b’a fɛ k’i ka bolomafara dafa cogo min na, o sugandi:

option1.heading: Sugandili 1: I ka bolomafara di Intɛrinɛti kan sisan
option1.description: I ka bolomafara dafa joona ni karti ye, ni karti debiti ye, walima ni wari saracogo wɛrɛw ye ɛntɛrinɛti kan an ka wariko dɛmɛbaga lakananen fɛ, n’o ye The Field ye . I bɛna impositi sɛbɛn sɔrɔ o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ.
option1.button: Aw ye bolomafara di The Field → fɛ

option2.heading: Sugandili 2nan: Banki ka wari bila The Roy Foundation la
option2.description: Aw ye wari bila banki siratigɛ la walima ka wari ci The Roy Foundation ma , an ka jɛɲɔgɔn fɛɛrɛbɔla ani wariko dɛmɛbaga. Nin sugandi in ka ɲi kosɛbɛ bolomafarabaw walima jamana wɛrɛw ka fɛnw cili kama.
option2.instructions: Aw ye " Orbital Temple - {donationType} " sɛbɛn ɲɛfɔli yɔrɔ la. I ka fɛnw jiginni dafa kɔfɛ, i ka bataki ci an ma sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art ni i ka fɛnw jiginni kunnafoniw ye walasa k’i ka impositi sɔrɔ.
option2.button: Aw ye anw sɔrɔ Deposit ko la →

taxInfo.heading: Nili min bɛ se ka bɔ impositi la
taxInfo.description: Orbital Temple ye The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , 501(c)(3) jɛkulu ye min tɛ tɔnɔ ɲini. Ameriki ka bolomafaraw bɛɛ bɛ se ka bɔ impositi la fo ka se hakɛ min ma sariya fɛ.
taxInfo.questions: Ɲininkaliw? Aw bɛ se ka anw sɔrɔ gabriela.veiga@orbitaltemple.art
